text: (Ba kofiron gufta meşavad): In azoʙ ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki cun Allohro ʙa jaktoī va ixlosi amal mexondand, şumo inkor mekarded va agar ʙaroi Ū şarike qaror medodand, şumo ʙa on şarik imon meovarded. Pas, farmon az oni Alloh ast. (Ū hokim ast dar xalqaş, odil ast, ki zulm namekunad, hidojat mekunad, kasero, ki mexohad va gumroh mekunad kasero, ki mexohad va kasero, ki xohad rahm mekunad va kasero, ki ʙixohad azoʙ medihad.) Nest ma'ʙudi ʙarhaq ʙa çuz Ū, ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurg ast
